DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate SpO2 accuracy performance Oxitone Medical Oxitone 1000 pulse oximeter non-motion condition range 70-100 % SaO2 compare arterial blood sample assess CO-Oximetry SpO2 validation . This study observational nature quantifies device performance accuracy comparison Reference Standard .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate SpO2 accuracy performance Oxitone Medical Oxitone 1000 pulse oximeter non-motion condition range 70-100 % SaO2 compare arterial blood sample assess CO-Oximetry SpO2 validation . The end goal show SpO2 accuracy performance Oxitone 1000 pulse oximeter . It expect Accuracy Root Mean Square ( Arms ) performance Oxitone 1000 pulse oximeter meet specification 3 good non-motion condition range 70-100 % SaO2 thereby demonstrate acceptable SpO2 accuracy performance specification
DOC.criteria: healthy individual age 1846 year . Clotting disorder , diabetes , currently take psychotropic medication .
DOC.keyword: This study determine measurement accuracy physiological parameter
